column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I can say that it is the best steak I've ever had
column2: they serve the food so fast
column3: which is good for not waiting so long. They also have burgers and fries that can be a side dish for your steak
column4: the burger they made was so great! Also their fries
column5: it is so yummy and crispy. They have drinks too. Their drinks especially the wine is highly recommend. This Bavette's Bar & Boeuf can give a big
column6: big incredible dining experience! If you have not been at this place
column7: please go and try some of their dishes.
